root.data:
Relativity Desktop Client Command-Line Arguments: -------------------------------------------------
-h or /h Display this help page
:encoding Display a list of supported text encoding types on the this machine
The following arguments must be set and in the form specified; [flag]:[value] e.g. -f:"\Documents and Settings\relativityuser\Desktop\load file.dat" -f:C:\loadthis.opt -u:EDDSServiceAccount
[-f or /f]:[file path] Sets the import metadata file path - either native or opticon
[-c or /c]:[case artifact id] Points the client towards the case to be imported to
[-u or /u]:[relativity username] Sets the relativity user account that the import will be performed under
[-p or /p]:[relativity password] Validation for the user account
[-k or /k]:[saved settings kwe or kwi file path] Saved settings for the run to be performed
[-m or /m]:[image or native or i or n] Sets the import type - image or native - to be run
[-e or /e]:[code page id] Sets the encoding of the load file. This defaults to windows' default encoding. For a list of active encodings use -h:encoding.
[-x or /x]:[code page id] Sets the encoding of any full text files. This defaults to windows' default encoding. For a list of active encoding code page ids use -h:encoding.
[-r or /r]:[repository path] Sets the destination repository for loaded files. This defaults the case default.
[-l or /l]:[boolean value] Determines if files are actually copied to a relativity repository. Defaults to true.
[-d or /d]:[folder artifact id] Sets the destination folder for the upload. Defaults to the case root folder.
